title: St. George's Chapel, Windsor Residency
description: Amici Coro had the honor of performing at St. George's Chapel, Windsor Castle for a weekend in August 2024. The choir sang Evensong on Saturday and Sunday, as well as the Sunday Eucharist.

Saturday Evensong: Introit: O Lord, Give Thy Holy Spirit - Tallis
Sunday Evensong: Introit: If Ye Love Me - Tallis
